original_text: and the Arabah to the Sea of Chinneroth eastward, and in the direction of Beth-jeshimoth, to the Sea of the Arabah, the Salt Sea, southward to the foot of the slopes of Pisgah;
korean_text: 또 동방 아라바 긴네롯 바다까지이며 또 동방 아라바의 바다 곧 염해의 벧여시못으로 통한 길까지와 남쪽으로 비스가 산기슭까지이며

sentences.original_text: and the Arabah to the Sea of Chinneroth eastward
and in the direction of Beth-jeshimoth
to the Sea of the Arabah
southward to the foot of the slopes of Pisgah
